about_the_game:
Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by Silver Ridge Peaks.

This Pack Contains:
- Silver Ridge Peaks Orange Paint
- Silver Ridge Peaks Dark Grey Paint
- Silver Ridge Peaks Grey Paint
- Silver Ridge Peaks Olive Paint
- Silver Ridge Peaks Green Paint
- Silver Ridge Peaks Twigs Spray
- Silver Ridge Peaks Tiger Spray
- Silver Ridge Peaks Net Spray
- Silver Ridge Peaks English Walnut Wood
- Silver Ridge Peaks Birds Eye Maple Wood
- Silver Ridge Peaks Hunter Bark Camo
- Silver Ridge Peaks DPM Camo
- Silver Ridge Peaks Brushstroke Camo
- Silver Ridge Peaks Premium Wrap

The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.
